creator: netshark@sharkplanet.com
text:
Hi

Here's my log4j.properties :

log4j.rootCategory=DEBUG, dest1
log4j.appender.dest1=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
log4j.appender.dest1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.dest1.layout.ConversionPattern=[%d{dd.mm.yyyy}] %t %-5p %c : %m%n

and this is what I get :

[28.33.2003] AWT-EventQueue-0 INFO  OCVscroll : Bin im MouseDown

even if I only take the %d without formatting my date I get the same result.

Thank and
kind regards

Damian
